name: Ley Line Disorder: Frontline Tactics
description:
When the Action Phase begins: All your characters gain 1 Rally Up. (The next time they are defeated, ensure the character will not be defeated, and heal them to 4 HP.)
When you trigger Rally Up's effect: Your opponent gains 1 Omni Element.
